title: Mars Transit in the 6th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Mars transiting the 6th house strengthens your capacity to confront challenges, defeat opposition, and assert control over work, health, and daily responsibilities. This is a highly action-oriented phase where discipline, effort, and persistence bring tangible results. Competitive instincts sharpen, making it favorable for overcoming rivals, legal matters, and obstacles. However, aggression, impatience, or excessive pressure can strain health and workplace harmony. When guided by self-control, this transit supports victory through effort, resilience, and strategic action.

sections.heading: Work & Daily Effort
points: Willingness to take on tough tasks

closing: Mars in the 6th house rewards disciplined effort and strategic action. Controlled intensity converts struggle into steady victories.
